nodes.text: The OHS1782-03 system was a star system that was located within the Outer Rim Territories' Ash Worlds sector and was a part of the region known as the Slice. Between the years 25,120 BBY and 25,096 BBY, the system was known as the Xoraes system and was situated within the Kiirium Reaches region, a part of the empire of the Human warlord Xim. During that time, the Xoraes system was connected by hyperlanes to the Turallun, Gwynhes Minor, and Ulonsus systems, and Xim moved his forces to the system from Ulonsus.
The OHS1782-03 system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square T-7.
